name: Batman Arkham Asylum: The Road To Arkham
overview: The road to Arkham offers readers the chance to experience firsthand the story of how Batman™ single-handedly brought two of Gotham's hardest criminals to the asylum. Follow the in-depth story behind the capture of Zsasz and The Joker and along the way uncover additional hidden secrets surrounding the goings on in Arkham. © 2009 Eidos Interactive Ltd. Co-published by Eidos, Inc. and Warner Bros.Interactive Entertainment, a division of Warner Bros. Home Entertainment Inc.
